name: Millennium Lumbar Cushion De Luxe
descr:
Millennium Lumbar Support Cushion

With Millennium Lumbar Support Cushion, you protect the natural forward curve in the back while sitting. The lumbar vertebrae retain its natural position and the back muscles are relaxed.

The Chiroform Lumbar Support Cushion is made from viscoelastic memory foam.

Delivered with a soft and comfortable velvet cover, including strap. Stitched inner cover.
